_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

What one who does not truly know or see: To truly know old age and death
To truly know the origin of old age and death
To truly know the cessation of old age and death
To truly know the practice that leads to the cessation of old age and death.
